definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
border between countries/line forming the border
military demarcation line MDL/refers to Korean demilitarized zone DMZ
pinyin: ge2 jun1 shi4 fen1 jie4 xian4

sentences.english: You are exploring the frontiers in science.
sentences.chinese: 这个新的研究领域跨超了学科界线。

sentences.english: The name for this border between lunar night and day is the terminator line.
sentences.chinese: 我们把月亮上的黑白边界线叫做‘晨昏线’。

sentences.english: The Prut River forms Moldova"s entire western boundary with Romania."
sentences.chinese: 普鲁特河形成了整个西部与罗马尼亚的国界线。

sentences.english: The challenge is the boundary of personalisation and privacy.
sentences.chinese: 挑战在于个性化和隐私之间的分界线。

sentences.english: Yes, all of us writers need to guard against extravagating.
sentences.chinese: 是的，所有作家都要警惕不要逾越了这个界线。

sentences.english: The Cambrian-Ordovician boundary set between D.
sentences.chinese: 寒武系与奥陶系界线位于D。

sentences.english: An abandoned military road, overgrown with weeds, marked the former boundary line.
sentences.chinese: 一条长满野草的废弃军用公路标示出以前的边界线。

sentences.english: That puts the company right on the fuzzy no man's land between value and growth.
sentences.chinese: 这就使谷歌刚好落在价值股与成长股的分界线上。

sentences.english: Boundaries and guidelines need to be defined explicitly and firmly for the ENP child.
sentences.chinese: 对ENP孩子，界线和规定必须定义得明确而坚决。

sentences.english: We tend to make this line very fuzzy, turning a strength into a weakness.
sentences.chinese: 我们往往把界线划得很模糊，把优势变成了劣势。

sentences.english: The fence marks the boundary between my land and hers.
sentences.chinese: 这道栅子是我的地和她的地的分界线。

sentences.english: The line between good and evil is beginning to blur.
sentences.chinese: 善恶间的分界线已经变得模糊了。

sentences.english: Through the ages, the Opal has symbolized hope, innocence and purity.
sentences.chinese: 穿越年龄的界线，欧泊是象征希望，无邪，纯净。

sentences.english: No extraordinary disorder hinstanceens on the orderly circumference.
sentences.chinese: 在有序的界线上没有发作不寻常的杂沓。

sentences.english: Bingdaban fault is boundary, each other belong to hyperplasia belt of two plates.
sentences.chinese: 以冰达坂断裂为分界线，分别属于两大板块的增生带。

sentences.english: The boundary between the modern art and the secular world is distinct and absolute.
sentences.chinese: 现代艺术与世俗之间的界线被划分得相当清楚且绝对。

definition: border between countries/line forming the border
dividing line between distinct realms/boundary/field-allocation (in Chinese astrology, the association between celestial regions and corresponding terrestrial realms)
as rivers Jing and Wei separate clearly (idiom)/to be entirely different
(fig.) gulf/chasm/wide gap/(originally) the Hong Canal in Henan, which in ancient times formed the border between enemies Chu 楚 and Han 漢|汉
